price: 177. Ceux qui ont acheté la mécréance au prix de la foi ne nuiront en rien à Allah, et ils seront voués à un très douloureux supplice.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱشۡتَرَوُاْ ٱلۡكُفۡرَ بِٱلۡإِيمَٰنِ لَن يَضُرُّواْ ٱللَّهَ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ish'tarawū al-kuf'ra bil-īmāni lan yaḍurrū al-laha shayan walahum ʿadhābun alīmun
